article: democratic senate candidate ned lamont released new radio ads on saturday intended to dispel any concerns that he lacks enough political experience to replace the incumbent , joseph i. lieberman , even as a new poll showed lamont continuing to run ahead of lieberman just days from the democratic primary .
abstract: lamont ads question value of lieberman 's years in office
